mainTask: Write an article on benefits of meditation

subtasks.subtaskName: Research the benefits of meditation (stress reduction, improved focus, emotional regulation, etc.)
Find supporting evidence and credible sources (studies, expert opinions)
Outline the article structure (introduction, body paragraphs, conclusion)
Write the introduction (hook, background on meditation, thesis statement)
Write body paragraphs (each focusing on a specific benefit, with evidence)
Write the conclusion (summarize benefits, call to action)
Edit and proofread the article for clarity, grammar, and style
Create a compelling title and meta description
Format the article for readability (headings, subheadings, bullet points)
Add images or other visuals to enhance the article
